snippet.title: Hello Sunshine — official teaser trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3245140/

"Hello Sunshine" is a mystery survival game set in the ruins of a corporate empire.

Walk in the shadow of a giant robot during the sweltering days; stay close to keep warm during the cold nights. Scavenge, craft, upgrade — and piece together the broken puzzle of a world ruled by machines that refuse to shut down.

Visit the official website: https://www.redthreadgames.com/hellosunshine
